question: Which statement is true for Replica set?
answer_a: Replica set is considered as a substitute to the replication controller. The prime function of replica set is to assure the number of pod replicas running.
answer_b: Replica set is considered as the legacy replication controller. The prime function of replica set is to remove the number of pod replicas running.
correct_answer: Replica set is considered as a substitute to the replication controller. The prime function of replica set is to assure the number of pod replicas running.
